name: Bash-update-script
body:
bash-update-script
==================
Just a very simple 3 command script made to semi-automate the update process.

---
`apt-get update`
`apt-get upgrade`
`apt-get autoclean`

---
Features:
* autoclean
* update
* upgrade

---
